thread.title: Olufemi Asafa
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Olufemi Asafa

author: Olufemi Asafa
title: Olufemi Asafa
text: The pair was a Christmas gift and I am very pleased with the design and feel. I would highly recommend to anyone interested in designs like this. Further, the shipment was fast and the sunglasses were well packaged. This was my first order on Framesdirect. I'm definitely coming back for more purchases in future.
